sec.title: Introduction
sec.p: Geriatric day hospitals developed rapidly in the United Kingdom in the 1960s as an important component of care provision. The model has since been widely applied in several Western countries. Day hospitals provide multidisciplinary assessment and rehabilitation in an outpatient setting and have a pivotal position between hospital and home based services. ... We therefore undertook a systematic review of the randomized trials of day hospital care.
